partners.name: International Business Machine (IBM)
partners.desc: The International Business Machines Corporation is an American multinational technology and consulting corporation, headquartered in Armonk, New York, United States. Partnered with Vivacom for its Products and Services.

partners.name: CISCO
partners.desc: Cisco Systems produces computer networking products and services. The Linksys brand of consumer networking products is an owned subsidiary of Cisco Systems. Vivacom is proud to partner with CISCO.

partners.name: Oracle
partners.desc: Oracle Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation headquartered in Redwood City, California. It engineers hardware and software to work together. Vivacom is proud to partner with Oracle.

partners.name: CD Networks
partners.desc: CD Networks enables Global Cloud Acceleration. Their mission is to transform the Internet into a secure, reliable, scalable, high performing Application Delivery Network. Vivacom is proud to partner with CD Networks.

partners.name: ESTEL Technologies
partners.desc: Estel Technologies, ISO 9001:2008 certified, is a leading Mobile Financial Services technology enabler with global presence among Telecom Operators, Banks, and Service Providers. Vivacom is proud to associate with them.

partners.name: Kochar Info Tech (P) Ltd
partners.desc: Kochar, Indiaâ€™s leading private sector business house, has interests in IT, Consulting, BPO & KPO Services. They proudly partner with Vivacom.

partners.name: Formula Telecom Solution
partners.desc: Formula Telecom Solution is a Mobile Financial Services technology enabler with significant global presence. Vivacom is proud to associate with them.

partners.name: Hewlett Packard (HP)
partners.desc: HP, an American multinational IT company, develops and provides hardware, software and services to consumers, SMBs, enterprises and government, health, and education sectors.
